Description: Enable secure customer registration and identity verification compliant with KYC/AML regulations. Provide multiple authentication methods including password, biometric, and multi-factor authentication.
Provide comprehensive account viewing and management capabilities including balance viewing, transaction history, statement downloads, and account settings.
Enable secure and efficient money movement including internal transfers, external transfers, bill payments, and scheduled payments with fraud detection.
Comprehensive debit and credit card lifecycle management including activation, deactivation, limits, PIN management, and virtual cards.
Protect customer accounts through real-time fraud detection, suspicious activity monitoring, and multi-layered security controls.
Digital loan application, approval workflow, document management, and loan servicing including repayments and status tracking.
Investment portfolio management including securities trading, mutual funds, portfolio tracking, and financial advisory services.
Enable seamless customer service through in-app chat, service requests, complaint management, and self-service help resources.
Real-time communication system for transaction alerts, security notifications, bill reminders, and promotional messages with preference management.
Ensure compliance with banking regulations through KYC renewal, AML monitoring, audit logging, and regulatory report generation.
